timeline.message: Add fluff terrain types and some SirMegaV buildings
Saxarba Tileset: Adding addtl saxarba buildings
Saxarba Tileset: Pavements as base (to correct shadow problems)

timeline.bodyText: instead of is following the fluff:XX:X-XX, it should be are the
timeline.author: Windchild292
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,229 @@
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+# --------------- SirMegaV Custom  -------------------
+# --------------- Faction Symbols an Red Cross ---------------
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+
+# Faction Symbols and the Res Cross
+# Should be included late so they draw on top of buildings
+
+# fluff:50:1-13 is Cappellan Confederation Faction Symbol
+# fluff:51:1-13 is Draconis Combine Faction Symbol
+# fluff:52:1-13 is Federated Suns Faction Symbol
+# fluff:53:1-13 is Free Worlds League Faction Symbol
+# fluff:54:1-13 is Lyran Commonwealth Faction Symbol
+# fluff:55:1-13 is Terran Hegemony Faction Symbol
+# fluff:56:1-13 is Magistracy of Canopus Faction Symbol
+# fluff:57:1-13 is Outworlds Alliance Faction Symbol
+# fluff:58:1-13 is Rimworlds Republic Faction Symbol
+# fluff:59:1-13 is Taurian Concordat Faction Symbol
+# fluff:60:1-13 is Star League/Star League Faction Symbol
+# fluff:61:1-13 is Star League/ComStar Faction Symbol
+# fluff:62:1-13 is a Red Cross Symbol

timeline.author: Windchild292
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,240 @@
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+# --------------- SirMegaV Custom  -------------------
+# --------------- Letters ---------------
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+
+# Letters on the ground
+# Should be included late so they draw on top of buildings
+
+# fluff:70:1-78 is White Letters
+# fluff:71:1-78 is Black Letters
+# fluff:72:1-30 is White Numbers
+# fluff:73:1-30 is Black Numbers

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # Should be included late so they draw on top of buildings

          
          
            
            # Should be included late so they can be drawn on top of buildings
timeline.author: Windchild292
Windchild292
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,107 @@
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+# --------------- SirMegaV   -------------------
+# --------------- Sea Port System ---------------
+# ----------------------------------------------------
+
+# Sea Port with containers
+# Uses fluffed woods as terrain. Containers provide cover, make moving
+# more difficult and can be destroyed which all fits woods.
+# the crane tips are fluff terrain without woods
+# Must be included before standard woods
+
+# wood:1;fluff:80:1-29 is Containers
+# wood:1;fluff:81:1-48 is Cranes
+# fluff:82:1-6 is Crane tips

timeline.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Based on other files, should this be noted as legacy?
timeline.author: Windchild292
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,78 @@
+# Pavement
+
+# Unfortunately super pavements will interfere too heavily with terrain shadows
+# until a better system is found, this is reverted to the old pavement as base
+## INACTIVE: Using super for pavement instead of base because of the ground_fluff use
+## super terrains will only find exact matches while base terrain
+## will find best matches; super avoids having unwanted terrain images
+## Pavement should be included very early as it should be underneath everything (draw first)
+
+# pavement:1 is saxarba's pavement
+## pavement:1;ground_fluff:1 is SirMegaV's pavement
+## pavement:1;ground_fluff:2 is saxarba's pavement urban garden variation
+# pavement:2 is saxarba's pavement urban garden variation (should not use terrain level)

replies.bodyText: I have commented the two lines with ## further with "(not implemented currently)". The other two (thus: all pavement) are actually unchanged over previous versions of saxarba because of the shadows problem detailed above those lines. I have various solutions in mind, maybe I'll get around to fixing this...
replies.author: SJuliez

timeline.author: Windchild292
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
+General --------------------
+fluff:2 - helipad, beacon
+fluff:4 - squares and pillars
+fluff:5 - roads with cars
+fluff:6 - skylights, building adornments
+fluff:7 - construction
+fluff:8 - garden
+fluff:9 - Maglev trains
+fluff:10 - Maglev tracks
+fluff:13 - animals
+fluff:14 - runway markings
+woods:1;fluff:12 - orchard
+fluff:90:1-9 - Glass Roofs
+fluff:91:1-12 - Sports Courts
+fluff:92:1-5 - Swimming Pools
+fluff:93:1-14 - Gardens
+
+Roads ---------------
+
+road:1;road_fluff:1 - rounded road corners
+road:1;road_fluff:2 - horizontal roads
+
+Buildings ---------------
+
+building:1:00;bldg_fluff:1-4 - single hex light buildings
+building:1:*;bldg_fluff:100 - multi hex (variable) light buildings
+
+building:2:00;bldg_fluff:1-34 - single hex medium buildings
+building:2:*;bldg_fluff:1-12 - multi hex (fixed) medium buildings
+building:2:*;bldg_fluff:100 - multi hex (variable) medium buildings
+
+building:3:00;bldg_fluff:1-20 - single hex heavy buildings
+building:3:*;bldg_fluff:1-38 - multi hex (fixed) heavy buildings
+building:3:*;bldg_fluff:100 - multi hex (variable) heavy buildings
+
+building:4:00;bldg_fluff:1-15 - single hex hardened buildings
+building:4:*;bldg_fluff:1-54 - multi hex (fixed) hardened buildings
+building:4:*;bldg_fluff:100 - multi hex (variable) hardened buildings
+
+Ground Symbols, Factions -----------
+
+fluff:50:1-13 - Cappellan Confederation Faction Symbol
+fluff:51:1-13 - Draconis Combine Faction Symbol
+fluff:52:1-13 - Federated Suns Faction Symbol
+fluff:53:1-13 - Free Worlds League Faction Symbol
+fluff:54:1-13 - Lyran Commonwealth Faction Symbol
+fluff:55:1-13 - Terran Hegemony Faction Symbol
+fluff:56:1-13 - Magistracy of Canopus Faction Symbol
+fluff:57:1-13 - Outworlds Alliance Faction Symbol
+fluff:58:1-13 - Rimworlds Republic Faction Symbol
+fluff:59:1-13 - Taurian Concordat Faction Symbol
+fluff:60:1-13 - Star League/Star League Faction Symbol
+fluff:61:1-13 - Star League/ComStar Faction Symbol
+fluff:62:1-13 - a Red Cross Symbol
